```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(extrafont)
loadfonts(device = "win")
windowsFonts("Ubuntu Mono" = windowsFont("Ubuntu Mono"))
```


#### Load data
```{r}
data <- read.csv("population_prospects.csv")
data <- data %>% mutate(population = population / 1000)
data
```
Styles used:  

Blue  #3288bd  
Red - #d53e4f  
Gray - #5D646F  
Grid - #5D646F  
Background - #F3F7F7  

Font Family - Ubuntu Mono  
Font Size:  
Title - 30  
Subtitle - 18  
Axis - 13  
  
#### Create vizualization
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = year)) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "estimate"),
    aes(y = population),
    color = "#3288bd",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "medium variant"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "high variant"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "constant fertility"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "instant replacement"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "momentum"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "zero migration"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "constant mortality"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(data, type == "no change"),
    aes(y = population),
    linetype = "dashed",
    color = "#d53e4f",
    size = 0.65
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.title =  element_blank(),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#F3F7F7"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#F3F7F7"),
    title = element_text(size = 30),
    text = element_text(family = "Ubuntu Mono", colour = "#5D646F")
  ) +
  ggtitle("Ukraine Population Prospects")
```
